articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Senegalese President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Senegalese President
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Senegalese President Macky Sall on September 11.
					 In the message the president said he was very pleased to send the warmest congratulations to Kim Jong Un on behalf of the people and government of Senegal and on his own behalf on the occasion of the national day of the DPRK.
					
					 He sincerely wished the Korean people well-being and prosperity.
					
					 Rejoicing over the cooperative relations between the two countries, he reiterated his determination to make positive efforts to boost these relations.

articles.title: New Medal Instituted in DPRK
articles.content:
New Medal Instituted in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station, which appeared as a grand monumental structure of lasting value in the land of Mt. Paektu, is a proud monument of youth in the great era of Kim Jong Un making a leap forward full of youthful dynamism. 
					 The Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK decided to institute a medal marking the construction of the Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station in order to convey to posterity the feats performed by the members of the youth shock brigade and builders who successfully built the hero youth power station as an icon of the power of the youth, leaving a shining mark in the sacred history of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 A relevant decree was released on Sunday. 
					
					 The medal has five-pointed star with golden rays 38mm in diameter and 27mm circle in it. There are letters "Yongung Chongnyon" in a fluttering flag in the upper part of the circle and Mt. Paektu, dam of the power station, power transmission tower and woods of larch in the lower part of it. 
					
					 Its miniature medal decoration has a metal flat 33mm in width and 10mm in length.

articles.title: S. Korean Vessel Slams into DPRK's Boat in East Sea of Korea, Damaging It
articles.content:
S. Korean Vessel Slams into DPRK's Boat in East Sea of Korea, Damaging It
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- There occurred a grave provocation in the East Sea of Korea at a time when the south Korean authorities' anti-DPRK confrontational racket is casting a dark shadow over the efforts for mending the north-south relations.
					 At around 01:25 on October 1 a south Korean vessel deliberately rammed into Turubong-3, a boat belonging to the Foreign Trade Administration Bureau of North Hamgyong Province when it was conducting fishing operation at location 39 °12´56゛north latitude and 131° 31´26゛east longitude, wounding five crewmen and damaging its body before taking to flight.
					
					 The bulwarks on the portside in the distance of about 20 m from the bow to the middle part of the boat were damaged and the deck of the portside was completely destroyed. The bow mast became bended and lots of lamps in the bow were crushed to pieces, the steel plate in the bow was dented and several structures were destroyed.
					
					 At that time, the surrounding was very bright as the boat was in a standstill position to catch squid with 12 1kw lamps on. But the south Korean vessel deliberately slammed into the boat before taking to flight.
					
					 Witnesses said that the hull of the south Korean vessel had its name "HIGHNY" and letter reading "Jeju" signifying port of registry was seen.
					
					 The captain of Turubong-3 called the south Korean vessel over walkie-talkie to talk to its captain. The south Korean vessel replied that it would tell its captain and wait for him. But the vessel fled away towards 230°course at high speed.
					
					 This was not only a crude violation of the compulsory requirements of the UN Maritime Law calling any ship which caused a clash in the open sea to help the other ship and an inhumanitarian act bereft of an iota of compatriotism. 
					
					 The south Korean authorities should not pay lip-service to "humanitarianism" but strictly investigate the vessel and prime movers, make apology for the piracy and pay proper compensation for the damage done to our crewmen and boat.

articles.title: U.S. Student Deported from DPRK
articles.content:
U.S. Student Deported from DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The DPRK government deported Won Moon Joo, a student of New York University of the U.S., via Panmunjom on October 5 in line with a humanitarian measure.
					 He illegally entered the DPRK through the DPRK-Chinese border on April 22nd.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, October 5  (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Supreme Court led by First Vice-President Choe Kun Yong returned home Monday after taking part in the international forum of jurists held in Vladivostok, Russia.

articles.title: Delegations of Overseas Koreans Here
articles.content:
Delegations of Overseas Koreans Here
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Delegations of overseas Koreans arrived here on Monday to participate in celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They included a delegation of the International United Confederation of Koreans led by First Vice-Chairman Kim Chil Song, a delegation of the Confederation of Koreans in Far Eastern and Siberian Regions of Russia led by Chairman Paek Ku Son, a delegation of the Confederation of Koreans in Sakhalin Region of Russia led by Chairman Ri Ku Yul, a delegation of the Confederation of Koreans in Kamchatka Territory of Russia led by Ri Sun Ok and a delegation of the Confederation of Koreans in Kazakhstan led by O Nam Gyu.

articles.title: Delegations of Juche Idea Study Organizations Here
articles.content:
Delegations of Juche Idea Study Organizations Here
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Delegations of organizations for the study of the Juche idea arrived here on Monday to participate in celebrations of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 They included a delegation of the Far Eastern Association for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism of Russia led by Chairman Gennady Kulikov, a delegation of the German Group for the Study of Works of Comrade Kim Il Sung and Comrade Kim Jong Il led by Chief Torsten Schoevitz and a delegation of the Warsaw Group for the Study of the Juche Idea led by Chief Jacech Poniewierski.

articles.title: Delegations of Overseas Koreans Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Delegations of Overseas Koreans Visit Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Delegations of the International United Confederation of Koreans, the Confederation of Koreans in Sakhalin Region of Russia, the Confederation of Koreans in Kamchatka Territory of Russia, the Confederation of Koreans in Kazakhstan and the Confederation of Koreans in Far Eastern and Siberian Regions of Russia visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill on Monday. 
					 They laid bouquets before the statues and paid tribute to them.

articles.title: Multiple-Launch Rocket Systems Presented to KPA Units
articles.content:
Multiple-Launch Rocket Systems Presented to KPA Units
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Multiple-launch rocket systems "Nyomaeng-ho" associated with the ardent patriotism of the women across the country were presented to units of the Korean People's Army (KPA) on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 A presentation ceremony was held in front of the Monument to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War on Monday.
					
					 Present at the ceremony were officials of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces, officials concerned and those of the women's union, service personnel and members of the women's union.
					
					 Kim Jong Sun, chairwoman of the C.C., the women's union, made a presentation address to be followed by speeches.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony, the rocket systems left for units of the KPA.

articles.title: National Photo Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Photo Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- A national photo exhibition opened to celebrate the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed at the venue of the exhibition is a photo of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il standing atop Mt. Paektu, their faces beaming with broad smiles, and wishing Juche Korea bright future.
					
					 Also on display there are photos dealing with the tireless efforts made by them for founding and strengthening the party and leadership exploits of Marshal Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Also displayed are photos showing the stirring reality of the DPRK making steady leap forward under the leadership of the party.
					
					 An opening ceremony took place at the People's Palace of Culture on Monday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, officials concerned and working people in Pyongyang.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants went round the exhibition.

articles.title: National Fine Art Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Fine Art Exhibition Opens 
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- A national fine art exhibition opened to celebrate the 70th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed in the exhibition hall is a fine art piece depicting President Kim Il Sung being applauded by the participants at a conference hall where the founding of the WPK was proclaimed all over the world.
					
					 The hall houses fine art pieces dealing with the undying feats of the peerlessly great men who built the WPK into an ever-victorious steel-strong party, tested and experienced party and the mother party absolutely supported and trusted by the people as well as those portraying their great personality.
					
					 On display there are such works as acryl painting "During the days of founding 'Down-with-Imperialism Union'" and oil painting "October 10 Dawns".
					
					 Some pieces depict the undying feats performed by leader Kim Jong Il in developing the WPK into the party of the leader, a guiding force victoriously advancing the Songun revolution.
					
					 Among the paintings on display are hundreds of fine art pieces of diverse genres and forms dealing with achievements made in the field of fine arts in the drive to greet the 70th anniversary of the WPK as a grand festival including those depicting the efforts of service personnel and people of the DPRK. 
					
					 An opening ceremony took place at the Pyongyang Indoor Stadium Monday.
					
					 Present there were Kim Ki Nam, officials concerned and teachers and students of universities in the city.
					
					 Pak Chun Nam, minister of Culture, made an opening address.

articles.title: Renovated Sosan Hotel Opens
articles.content:
Renovated Sosan Hotel Opens
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Renovated Sosan Hotel opened on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The hotel situated in the sports village of Chongchun Street has hundreds of rooms, several big and small restaurants, a wading pool and various welfare facilities.
					
					 An opening ceremony took place on Monday.
					
					 Present there were Ro Tu Chol, vice-premier and chairman of the State Planning Commission, Kim Yong Hun, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, officials concerned, soldier-builders, officials and employees of the hotel and sportspersons.
					
					 Ro Tu Chol, addressing the ceremony, said that the completion of the renovation project of Sosan Hotel is a realization of behests of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who worked heart and soul for the development of sports of the country and it is a proud labor gift presented to the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK by dint of the great army-people unity. 
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants looked round the hotel.

articles.title: DPRK Pays Deep Attention to Training Reserve Sportspersons
articles.content:
DPRK Pays Deep Attention to Training Reserve Sportspersons
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The Democratic People's Republic of Korea showed good results in recent international juvenile sports tournaments as it has directed big efforts to training reserve sportspersons.
					 The DPRK has a large number of juvenile sports schools in cities and counties, which major in football, basketball, volleyball, table-tennis and other events.
					
					 Such schools for training reserve persons are also operated at Kim Il Sung Stadium, Pyongyang Indoor Stadium and other stadiums and gymnasiums across the country while sports groups are run at schoolchildren's palaces and halls. And many sports teams have their own bases of producing reserve athletes.
					
					 Meanwhile, regional or national sports contests are held on a regular basis in the country every year, with the participation of those from juvenile sports schools and groups.
					
					 Thanks to this system of training reserve sportspersons, the country has proven successful in many international games.

articles.title: Combined Service Boat Mujigae Inaugurated
articles.content:
Combined Service Boat Mujigae Inaugurated
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Combined service boat Mujigae was inaugurated in the DPRK.
					 At least 1 230 guests can cruise in the picturesque Taedong River at a time, being served with Korean and world famous dishes.
					
					 The boat has such service facilities as national food restaurant, soft drink room, dinning room, banquet hall, buffet restaurant, deck restaurant, revolving restaurant and shop.
					
					 An inaugural ceremony took place on the bank of the River Taedong on Monday.
					
					 Present there were Pak Pong Ju, Choe Thae Bok and others, commanding officers and service personnel who built the boat, officials concerned and those in the field of shipbuilding and working people in the city.
					
					 DPRK Premier Pak Pong Ju made an opening address.
					
					 The boat which opened on the threshold of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea is a gift of love Marshal Kim Jong Un presented to the Korean people, he said.
					
					 He called upon the officials and employees of the boat would translate into reality the intention of the party which is prioritizing the interests and conveniences of the people and holding them absolute through good service in the spirit of devoted service to the people.
					
					 At the end of the ceremony the participants went round various places of the boat.

articles.title: New Kyonghung Restaurant Starts Service
articles.content:
New Kyonghung Restaurant Starts Service
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Kyonghung Restaurant has been newly built in Kyonghung Street of Pothonggang District, Pyongyang on the threshold of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 The three-storied restaurant with a total floor space of at least 1,600 square meters has national dish hall, dinning hall, party hall, shop, bath room, barber's, beauty salon, massage room, etc.
					
					 After its opening to visitors Monday, the restaurant served war veterans in Pyongyang

articles.title: Party's Leadership Is Sure Guarantee for Victory of Socialist Cause: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Party's Leadership Is Sure Guarantee for Victory of Socialist Cause: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Monday devotes an article to the 25th anniversary of the work of leader Kim Jong Il "The Workers' Party of Korea Organizes and Guides All the Victories of Our People." 
					 The work published on Oct. 3, 1990 clarifies the idea that the party's leadership is a sure guarantee for the victory of the socialist cause and deals with the issue of developing the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) into the Juche-type revolutionary party and clarifies basic ways of fulfilling the mission and duty of the party as a political leadership body.
					
					 The party's leadership is a sure guarantee for strengthening the driving force of the socialist cause and enhancing its role, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The socialist construction in the DPRK could make steady victorious progress along its orbit despite difficulties and hardship. The master key to this was that the party has given top priority to the work of strengthening the driving force of the revolution.
					
					 Today the WPK is dynamically pushing forward the drive of building a thriving nation by dint of the great army-people unity by building up the driving force of the revolution with the People's Army as the main force.
					
					 The WPK is a guiding force of the Songun revolution as it is regarding the fighting spirit of the People's Army, the main force of the revolution, as the spirit of the times and wisely leading the whole society to learn from its fighting traits.
					
					 The party's leadership is a prerequisite to consistently maintaining the revolutionary principle and firmly embodying it in the whole course of carrying out the socialist cause.
					
					 The historical experience and lesson prove that if the revolutionary principle is adhered to, the socialist cause will advance despite whatever difficulties and hardship but if this principle is abandoned, it will suffer degeneration and a setback halfway.

articles.title: odong Sinmun Accuses Japanese Reactionaries of Their Moves to Write off Japan's Crime-Woven History
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Accuses Japanese Reactionaries of Their Moves to Write off Japan's Crime-Woven History
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the Japanese Foreign Ministry deleted the column "History problem" from its website and newly opened and made public the column "Question and answer concerning history problem", claiming it reflects the contents of Abe's "statement" released on the lapse of 70 years since the defeat of the Japanese imperialists. 
					 It said that the new contents of the column are based not only on Abe's statement but also on Murayama's statement and the understanding of government's stand for the history problem is expected to get deeper.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Monday says in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This goes to clearly prove that what extreme phase the Japanese reactionaries have reached in their impudent and shameless moves to write off their crime-woven history.
					
					 Tampering with history has become a state policy of Japan.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists' aggression against Korea and their 40 odd year-long colonial rule over it, the most brutal and cruel in the world history, are still lashing the world people into great fury.
					
					 It is as clear as noonday why the Japanese reactionaries are making so desperate efforts to embellish their past crimes. 
					
					 Militarist Japan who worked hard to become "leader of the east" in the last century is going reckless, keen to revive a war state.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries are the impudent, cunning and cruel Samurais who are little short of the Japanese imperialist aggressors in the past.
					
					 The Korean people greatly angered by the Japanese reactionaries' moves to distort the history will surely force them to pay a thousand-fold dearer price for the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists no matter how much water flows under the bridge.

articles.title: U.S. and Its Followers' "Human Rights" Rhetoric Ridiculed
articles.content:
U.S. and Its Followers' "Human Rights" Rhetoric Ridiculed
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Russia bitterly denounced human rights abuses by the U.S. and EU countries at the 30th session of the UN Human Rights Council.
					 Russia's concern and criticism of the human rights abuses in the U.S. and the West is a reflection of the world mindset, not just an opinion of the individual country, says Minju Joson in a commentary Monday.
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 Inhumanitarian disasters, serious international issues, are more or less attributable to the tentacles of the U.S.
					
					 Some EU countries also played a role in cruelly killing a lot of people and producing a large number of refugees in the Mideast and African region by zealously following the U.S. "war on terrorism".
					
					 Even at this moment, the U.S. and some EU countries are punishing without trials terrorist suspects and taking lives of a number of innocent civilians of sovereign countries by flying drones there.
					
					 They, styling themselves "human rights judges", are pointing accusing fingers at other countries in the international arena, feigning ignorance of their own wrongs.
					
					 The rhetoric of "human rights" touted by the U.S. and EU countries is a shameless act to evade international criticism of their human rights abuses and responsibility for them.
					
					 They had better admit their own human rights abuses and mind their own business before finding fault with others.

articles.title: Military Nexus with Japan Condemned in S. Korea
articles.content:
Military Nexus with Japan Condemned in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held a press conference outside the building of the Defense Ministry on Oct. 1 in denunciation of the authorities' military tie-up with Japan.
					 The organization said that an official of the Japanese Defense Ministry would tour south Korea to explain its military authorities about the security legislation and schedule the ministerial-level talks.
					
					 It is self-evident that Japan's moves to revive militarism and turn itself into a military giant is designed to reinvade the Korean Peninsula and mount an illegal preemptive attack on the DPRK, it noted.
					
					 Tightened military exchange and cooperation with Japan would put south Korea under Japan's military control, it deplored, warning that this would lead to south Korea-Japan military alliance.
					
					 It demanded the authorities stop humiliating military cooperation with Japan, express protest against Japan's moves to revive militarism and turn itself into a military giant and take over wartime operation control from the U.S. at an early date.

articles.title: S. Korean Civilians Threatened by Bullets Fired by U.S. Forces
articles.content:
S. Korean Civilians Threatened by Bullets Fired by U.S. Forces 
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The U.S. aggressor forces present in south Korea are recklessly firing bullets into populated areas from a military drill ground in Phochon of Kyonggi Province, according to Yonhap News of south Korea. 
					 A resident in Yami-ri, Yongbuk-myon, Phochon City found a bullet 5cm long and about 1.5cm in caliber in his cow house on October 1. 
					
					 A similar bullet was found in the same place on September 16. 
					
					 The war drills of the U.S. warmongers ceaselessly threaten south Korean populated areas.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Marked by Russia and Countries of Commonwealth of Independent States
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Marked by Russia and Countries of Commonwealth of Independent States
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- A joint seminar of political parties and organizations of Russia and countries of the Commonwealth of Independent States took place in Moscow on Sept. 30 to celebrate the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Present at the seminar were delegates of 15 political parties and organizations and figures of various circles of ten countries including Russia, Kyrgyzstan, Ukraine, Moldova and Estonia.
					
					 Present there on invitation were the DPRK ambassador to Russia and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 Taysaev, secretary of the C.C. the Communist Party of the Russian Federation and first vice-chairman of the Central Council of the Union of Communist Parties-Communist Party of the Soviet Union, made an opening address.
					
					 Then Umalatova, chairwoman of the Party for Peace and Unity of Russia, Yermalabichs, secretary of the C.C., the Estonian Communist Party, Petrov, chairman of the Russian Association for Friendship and Cultural Cooperation with the DPRK, and others made speeches.
					
					 They said that the lesson drawn from the reality of socialist Korea which has invariably held aloft the banner of socialism despite the imperialists' pressure and blockade for several decades is that the collapse of the Soviet Union, a powerful socialist state, was not merely a product of the imperialists' moves. 
					
					 The basic reason for its collapse lay in the irresponsibility of the leadership of the Communist Party of the Soviet Union at that time which yielded to the imperialists, abandoning the faith in socialism, they noted.
					
					 Saying that the socialist cause led by the WPK is sure to triumph, they mentioned that all the ideologies and theories advanced by the WPK are the precious assets to be regarded by those struggling for the revival of socialism as guidelines.
					
					 A congratulatory message to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the seminar.
					
					 And a statement supporting the cause of the WPK was issued there

articles.title: Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Participants of International Seminar
articles.content:
Congratulatory Message to Kim Jong Un from Participants of International Seminar
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), received a congratulatory message from the participants of a joint seminar of political parties and organizations from Russia and countries of the Commonwealth of Independent States on Sept. 30. The seminar was held to observe the 70th anniversary of the WPK.
					 The message said:
					
					 We extend sincere congratulations to you on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the WPK, a great holiday.
					
					 The WPK, organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people, was founded on October 10, 1945.
					
					 Victories were achieved not only in battlefields but also at worksites under the leadership of the Party.
					
					 The WPK demonstrated before mankind its fame as the party of creation, progress and development and as the party which has fought against the bloody monster of capital.
					
					 The WPK has stood in the van of the movement for solidarity among workers in the world and its determination has great impact on the destiny of peoples in various countries and continents.
					
					 Your party founded by President Kim Il Sung 70 years ago has always represented the most powerful scio-political force leading the dignified and staunch Korean people to prosperity.
					
					 The WPK, doubtlessly, plays the role of vanguard of all progressive forces of the world.
					
					 The world people are looking up to the WPK and the DPRK as an example of courage and fortitude, revolutionary spirit and decisiveness, loyalty to the great idea of socialism and people's power.
					
					 The DPRK has turned into an impregnable socialist fortress under the leadership of Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, guided by the WPK, the Juche idea and the Songun idea.
					
					 Respected Comrade Kim Jong Un
					
					 Thanks to your wise leadership the DPRK has been fully recognized as the most authoritative and respected state.
					
					 We sincerely hope that you will display inexhaustible energy and will and the WPK will more strikingly demonstrate its dignity and the flag of the DPRK will always flutter vigorously in all parts of the world.

articles.title: Feats of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Will Be Immortal: Peruvian Political Party
articles.content:
Feats of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il Will Be Immortal: Peruvian Political Party
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union issued a statement on Sept. 30 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The statement noted that the WPK has led the Korean people to victory over the last seven decades, guided by the Juche idea, Songun idea founded and developed in depth by President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Immortal will be the feats they performed by dedicating their whole lives to developing the WPK into an ever-victorious party and the great guiding force of the revolution and construction, it noted, adding:
					
					 The WPK is demonstrating its might as organizer and guide of all victories of the Korean people under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un and shedding its rays as a beacon of hope for the progressive political parties and people of the world struggling for independence and justice.
					
					 The Peruvian National Independent Movement for Free Voting's Union extends warm congratulations to the WPK and the Korean people, regarding the significant celebration of the 70th anniversary of the WPK as great honor.

articles.title: WPK's Founding Anniversary Celebrated in Foreign Countries
articles.content:
WPK's Founding Anniversary Celebrated in Foreign Countries
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- A DPRK photo and book exhibition took place in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia and DPRK photo exhibitions and film shows in Anambra, Edo and Lagos of Nigeria and they were also held by the General Union of the Algerian Workers and Saut Al Ahrar Newspaper Office of Algeria between Sept. 28 and Oct. 3 on the occasion of the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were famous works of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un and books and photos dealing with the glorious history of the WPK and the Korean people's efforts to build a thriving socialist nation.
					
					 Films shown included Korean films "Song Dedicated to the Party" and "Masikryong Ski Resort".
					
					 Present at the events were figures from all walks of life and masses of relevant countries. 
					
					 Speakers at an event held in Malaysia said that the WPK founded by the President and developed by Kim Jong Il has demonstrated its dignity and might as the party which enjoys absolute support and trust of the Korean people.
					
					 Figures of Edo State of Nigeria highly praised Kim Jong Un for steadily developing the WPK into the party of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: October 4 Declaration Serves as Milestone of Independent Reunification, Peace and Prosperity: UK Organization
articles.content:
October 4 Declaration Serves as Milestone of Independent Reunification, Peace and Prosperity: UK Organization
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its website an article titled "Milestone of independent reunification, peace and prosperity" on Sept. 30 on the occasion of the 8th anniversary of the publication of the historic October 4 declaration.
					 The article said that the historic October 4 declaration recorded in the history of the Korea's reunification movement conveys unremitting efforts made by leader Kim Jong Il for accomplishing the cause of national reunification, his noble love for the nation and shining feats performed by him for the patriotic struggle for reunification and powerfully encourages all Koreans in their dynamic struggle for reunification. 
					
					 The October 4 declaration provides a new springboard for national reconciliation and unity and a milestone of independent reunification, peace and prosperity along with the June 15 joint declaration, the article noted, adding:
					
					 The inter-Korean relations which covered the road of development under the banner of the June 15 joint declaration have entered into the higher stage thanks to the adoption of the October 4 declaration.
					
					 The adoption of the October 4 declaration was a shining victory of Kim Jong Il's transparent idea and line of national independence and the precious fruition of his high prestige, political caliber and noble virtue.

articles.title: WPK's Birthday Observed by Foreign Newspapers and Magazine
articles.content:
WPK's Birthday Observed by Foreign Newspapers and Magazine
 Pyongyang, October 5 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers and magazine dedicated special write-ups to the 70th founding anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on Sept. 29 and 30.
					 The Russian newspaper Pri Armurskiye Wedomostsi edited an article titled "70 years of leading the people" illustrated with the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il and a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Saying that the WPK has won victories only while weathering all sorts of trials and difficulties of history after its founding, the paper referred to the fact that under the leadership of the great party the Korean people defeated the U.S. imperialists who boasted of being the "strongest" in the world and built a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence in a short span of period and smashed the imperialist allied forces' moves to stifle them at the end of the last century, holding aloft the banner of Songun.
					
					 A newspaper of DR Congo carried an article titled "The party praised by the people" illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Un waving to the cheers of the crowd and a photo of the Tower of the Juche Idea.
					
					 The Mexican magazine Siempre featured an article titled "Invincible WPK" illustrated with a photo of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The magazine raised a question as to where is the secret of the invincibility of the WPK which has won only victories despite severe test of history for 70 years since its founding, and said:
					
					 Firstly, the secret lies in the guiding idea of the party.
					
					 The WPK's guiding idea is Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					 Secondly, it is the unity and cohesion of the whole party.
					
					 The WPK developed into an invincible party under the leadership of Kim Jong Il who carried forward the idea and cause of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Kim Jong Il turned the WPK into a steel-strong party all members of which act as one centered on the leader.
					
					 Thirdly, it is the people's absolute support and trust in the party.
					
					 The WPK regards it as the supreme principle of its activities to prioritize the people's interests and does everything for them.
					
					 What should be emphasized as regards the invincibility of the WPK, in particular, is that it holds the great leaders in high esteem.

articles.title: Establecida Medalla Conmemorativa de Construccion de Central Hidroelectrica
articles.content:
Establecida Medalla Conmemorativa de Construccion de Central Hidroelectrica
Pyongyang, 5 de octubre (ACNC) -- La Central Hidroelectrica Jovenes Heroes Paektusan, levantada en la zona del Paektu como creacion de eterna duracion, es el enorgullecedor monumento de jovenes de la gran epoca de Kim Jong Un.
					El Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea decidio establecer una Medalla Conmemorativa de Construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica Jovenes Heroes Paektusan para transmitir para siempre las proezas de los brigadistas juveniles y los constructores quienes la levantaron magnificamente como simbolo de la potencia de la juventud, asi que dejaron imborrables huellas en la sagrada historia del partido.
					
					Quedo publicado el dia 4 un decreto correspondiente del Presidium de la APS al respecto. 
					
					En la medalla se ven una estrella, las letras "Yongung Chongnyon", monte Paektu, dique de la central, torre de transmision electrica y bosque de alerce.
					
					En su reverso estan inscritas las letras "Medalla Conmemorativa de Construccion de la Central Hidroelectrica Jovenes Heroes Paektusan".

articles.title: Ju Won Mun se expulsa por via Phanmunjom
articles.content:
Ju Won Mun se expulsa por via Phanmunjom 
Pyongyang, 5 de octubre (ACNC) -- Segun las medidas humanitarias del gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea el estudiante de la Universidad de Nueva York de Estados Unidos, Ju Won Mun, quien entro ilegalmente el 22 de abril en la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea por la frontera Corea-China, fue expulsado este lunes por via Phanmunjom.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun condena maniobras criminales de reaccionarios japoneses
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun condena maniobras criminales de reaccionarios japoneses
Pyongyang, 5 de octubre (ACNC) -- Recientemente, el Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de Japon tacho el parrafo "problema de historia" de su pagina web y abrio el nuevo de "preguntas y respuestas en cuanto al problema de historia" so pretexto de reflejar el contenido de la "declaracion" de Abe publicada en ocasion del 70o aniversario de la derrota del imperialismo japones.
					 Y expreso que "el contenido nuevo" de este parrafo "se basa no solo en la declaracion de Abe, sino tambien en la de Murayama" y "espera que se profundice mas la compresion sobre la posicion del gobierno en cuanto al problema de la historia".
					
					 Esto demuestra otra vez que llegan al climax el descaro y la desfachatez de los reaccionarios japoneses que intentan borrar totalmente la historia llena de crimenes.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un comentario individual difundido este lunes y prosigue:
					
					 La tergiversacion de la historia se convirtio en la politica nacional de Japon.
					
					 La mas cruel y bestial agresion a Corea y dominacion colonial de mas de 40 anos por parte del imperialismo japones, sin precedentes en la historia mundial, causan hasta la fecha la indignacion de todo el mundo.
					
					 Es muy clara la intencion verdadera de los reaccionarios japoneses que hacen todos sus esfuerzos por embellecer su crimen del pasado.
					
					 Japon militarista que en el siglo pasado maniobraba tesoneramente para ser el "caudillo del Oriente", actua hoy imprudentemente por la rehabilitacion del Estado belico.
					
					  Los reaccionarios japoneses son la canalla de samurais descaros, astutos y crueles iguales con los agresores imperialistas japoneses del pasado.
					
					  Por mucho que transcurra el tiempo, el pueblo coreano, indignado ante las maniobras de los reaccionarios japoneses tendentes a tergiversar la historia, cobrara cientos de miles de veces el precio criminal de los imperialistas japoneses.

articles.title: Minju Joson condena los disparates de "DDHH" de EE.UU. y fuerzas aliadas
articles.content:
Minju Joson condena los disparates de "DDHH" de EE.UU. y fuerzas aliadas
Pyongyang, 5 de octubre (ACNC) -- En la recien efectuada 30a reunion del Consejo de Derechos Humanos de la ONU Rusia critico agudamente los actos de violacion de derechos humanos en Estados Unidos y los paises de la Union Europea.
					 Esto no es el criterio de un pais individual, sino la reflexion de la opinion publica del mundo.
					
					 Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual de este lunes y prosigue:
					
					  Detras de las catastrofes antihumanitarias que se presentan gravemente en escala internacional estan en mayor caso las garras de EE.UU.
					
					  Unos paises de la UE tambien persiguieron activamente a la "guerra antiterrorista" de EE.UU., de manera que desempenaron un papel importante en el asesinato cruel de numerosas personas y el surgimiento de muchos refugiados en el Oriente Medio y la region africana.
					
					En estos momentos tambien, EE.UU. y los paises de UE, perpetran tomando mano a mano las ejecuciones fuera del tribunal a los sospechosos del terrorismo y matan a numerosos habitantes inocentes con ataque de drones contra los Estados soberanos.
					
					 Pero, EE.UU. y la UE hacen actos lamentables de censurar a otros paises fingiendo del "jueces de derechos humanos" en la escena internacional sin querer saber su mancha.
					
					  Los disparates de "DDHH" de EE.UU. y los paises de la UE no pasan de ser la locura sucia encaminada a eliminar la censura internacional a su crimen de violacion de DDHH y liberarse de la responsabilidad.
					
					  EE.UU. y la UE deben reconocer su crimen de violacion de DDHH y purgarse de su crimen antes de cuestionar a otros paises.
